```{r packages}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(janitor)
library(estimatr)
```

```{r data}
test_dat <- read_excel("~/Documents/Uni/Behaviroural Economics/Experiment/test_dat.xlsx", 
    sheet = "simple")
```

```{r wrangling}
test_dat <- test_dat %>%
  mutate(d_m = m_cd - m_ab)
```

```{r work}
d_m_mean <- test_dat %>%
  group_by(treatment) %>%
  summarise(d_m_mean = mean(d_m, na.rm = TRUE))
  pull(d_m_mean)
  
```
```{r test}
model <- lm_robust(d_m ~ 1, data = test_dat, se_type = "HC3") 
  summary(model)
```
